title: Dust and Memory
goal: Set the stage for Book 2 and provide a moment of peace.
stakes_shift: The protagonists accept their roles as world-shapers.

scenes.summary: The refugees harvest their first crops, grown under the light of Astra's star.
Kaelen and Lyra stand on the ridge, watching the sunset.
scenes.outcome: They are finally at peace with their pasts.

scenes.summary: A lone traveler arrives at the valley gates, carrying a shard that looks like Astra's.
scenes.outcome: There are other 'Hearts' out there, and they are waking up.

scenes.summary: Kaelen takes up the hilt of the Star-Blade, which begins to glow again.
Lyra looks at the maps and points to a distant mountain range.
scenes.outcome: They decide to leave the valley to find the other shards.

scenes.summary: They walk out of the gates together as the screen fades to black.
